gesture_processing.cpp

1 /* Libraries */
2 #include "ros/ros.h"
3 #include "tf/tf.h"
4 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
5 #include "miro_teleop/GestureProcessing.h"
6 #include <cmath>
7 
8 /* Definitions */
9 #define HSIZE 400
10 #define VSIZE 400
11 #define H 80 // Height of the plane (in cm) with respect to the referential
12 
28 bool findTarget(miro_teleop::GestureProcessing::Request &req,
29  miro_teleop::GestureProcessing::Response &res)
30 {
31  /* Obtain body position */
32  geometry_msgs::Point position = req.gesture.position;
33 
34  /* Initial orientation reference (assuming alignment with x axis) */
35  tf::Vector3 reference(1,0,0);
36 
37  /* Convert from quaternion to rotated vector representation */
38  tf::Quaternion rotation;
39  quaternionMsgToTF(req.gesture.orientation, rotation);
40  tf::Vector3 direction = tf::quatRotate(rotation, reference);
41 
42  ROS_INFO("Quaternion received: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
43  req.gesture.orientation.x,
44  req.gesture.orientation.y,
45  req.gesture.orientation.z,
46  req.gesture.orientation.w);
47 
48  ROS_INFO("Position: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
49  position.x, position.y, position.z);
50  ROS_INFO("Direction: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
51  direction.x(), direction.y(), direction.z());
52 
53  /* Check whether user is pointing upwards */
54  if(direction.z() > 0)
55  {
56  ROS_INFO("Invalid gesture");
57  // Send a position out of the bounds
58  res.target.x = 2*HSIZE;
59  res.target.y = 2*VSIZE;
60  res.target.theta = 0;
61  }
62  else
63  {
64  /* If not, find target position in the x-y plane */
65 
66  double a = -(position.z-H)/(direction.z());
67  res.target.x = position.x + a*(direction.x());
68  res.target.y = position.y + a*(direction.y());
69  res.target.theta = atan2(res.target.y-position.y,
70  res.target.x-position.x);
71  // Bound conditions are verified by the master
72  }
73 
74  ROS_INFO("Target: (%f,%f)", res.target.x, res.target.y);
75 
76  return true;
77 }
78 
83 int main(int argc, char **argv)
84 {
85  ros::init(argc, argv, "gesture_processing_server");
86  ros::NodeHandle n;
87  ros::ServiceServer service =
88  n.advertiseService("gesture_processing", findTarget);
89  ROS_INFO("Gesture processing service active");
90  ros::spin();
91 
92  return 0;
93 }
